message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a steal! I'm willing to let it go for $18000. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $15000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement within my budget?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $17000. This is my best offer for now.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on $16000 for the product?
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I can do $16500. This is my final offer on the higher end.
I understand your position, Alice. Would it be possible to reach a compromise at $16200 for the product?
